name: mountain climber (axgs)
description:
Use the arrows key to move the moutain climber guy. Don´t collide with the rocks and collect some gold nuggets! It's not finished, but a piece of playable retro styled game. I will expand this game in near future, piece by piece.

Have some fun!

This is my contribution to the trijam #214 ... I couldn't do more in 3 hours. Vanilla JavaScript with HTML5 canvas. 

tools I used:
PhpStorm as my favourite IDE
aseprite for graphics
tiled for level-editing :)
viteJS for developing, local webserver and bundling
